document.full_text: an explosion rocked a natural gas terminal in north sinai near egypt's border with israel on wednesday, sending flames shooting into the air and forcing the country's export pipeline to shut down, security officials said.
document.title: blast in egypt shuts pipeline
lines_and_colors: an explosion rocked a natural gas terminal in north sinai near egypt's border with israel on wednesday, sending flames shooting into the air and forcing the country's export pipeline to shut down, security officials said.
